title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-3.13 - Sewage system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-3.13 - Sewage system

State Regulations
(a) All waste water including filter backwash water from a spray ground shall be discharged in such a manner that waste water cannot be siphoned, flooded or otherwise discharged into the spray pad treatment tank. (b) Waste water from the spray ground shall discharge to a public sewer system or other approved sewage disposal system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
6-3.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
